EmailTemplate.name: SE2 Hannah
EmailTemplate.subject: Be an NCS Ambassador for a night in Bracknell!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Grads living in Bracknell!
Want to come and help us publicise NCS to this year's young people as an NCS Ambassador? Great experience for your CV!
Date - Tuesday 28th June
Time - 6.30pm
Location - Garth Hill College
Just email tcs.bucksandberks@the-challenge.org!
Amy
Amy
07469151467
Find us online: Website | Twitter | Facebook
The Challenge is a major provider of NCS (National Citizen Service)
The Challenge is in The Sunday Times 100 Best Not For Profit organisations to work for 2014.
